verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> certain <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto me <S%H3427><s%>, and sat before me <S%H6440><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, these men <S%H582><s%> have taken <S%H5927><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> into their heart <S%H3820><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> their face <S%H6440><s%>: should I be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of at all by them <S%H1875><s%>?

Therefore speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, and say unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Every man <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that taketh <S%H5927><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%> into his heart <S%H3820><s%>, and putteth <S%H7760><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>, and cometh <S%H935><s%> to the prophet <S%H5030><s%>; I Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> him therein <S%H935><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his idols <S%H1544><s%>;
that I may take <S%H8610><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their own heart <S%H3820><s%>, because they are all estranged <S%H2114><s%> from me through their idols <S%H1544><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Return <S%H7725><s%> ye <S%H7725><s%>, and turn yourselves from your idols <S%H1544><s%>; and turn away <S%H7725><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> from all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

For every one <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, or of the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that separateth <S%H5144><s%> himself from me <S%H310><s%>, and taketh <S%H5927><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%> into his heart <S%H3820><s%>, and putteth <S%H7760><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>, and cometh <S%H935><s%> to the prophet <S%H5030><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> for himself of me <S%H3068><s%>; I Jehovah will answer him by myself <S%H6030><s%>:

and I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that man <S%H376><s%>, and will make <S%H8074><s%> him an astonishment <S%H226><s%>, for a sign and a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, and I will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And if the prophet <S%H5030><s%> be deceived <S%H6601><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%>, I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have deceived <S%H6601><s%> that prophet <S%H5030><s%>, and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon him <S%H8045><s%>, and will destroy him from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall be even as the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of him that seeketh unto him <S%H1875><s%>;

that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may go no more astray <S%H8582><s%> from me <S%H310><s%>, neither defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves any more with all their transgressions <S%H6588><s%>; but that they may be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I may be their God <S%H430><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, when a land <S%H776><s%> sinneth <S%H2398><s%> against me by committing <S%H4604><s%> a trespass <S%H4603><s%>, and I stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon it <S%H7665><s%>, and break the staff <S%H4294><s%> of the bread <S%H3899><s%> thereof <S%H7971><s%>, and send famine <S%H7458><s%> upon it <S%H3772><s%>, and cut off from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>;

though these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, Noah <S%H5146><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, and Job <S%H347><s%>, were in it <S%H8432><s%>, they should deliver <S%H5337><s%> but their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

If <S%H3863><s%> I cause evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and they ravage <S%H7921><s%> it <S%H8077><s%>, and it be made desolate, so that no man may pass through <S%H5674><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the beasts <S%H2416><s%>;

though these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> were in it <S%H8432><s%>, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, they should deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither sons <S%H1121><s%> nor daughters <S%H1323><s%>; they only should be delivered <S%H5337><s%>, but the land <S%H776><s%> should be desolate <S%H8077><s%>.

Or if I bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon that land <S%H776><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Sword <S%H2719><s%>, go through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>; so that I cut off <S%H3772><s%> from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>;

though these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> were in it <S%H8432><s%>, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, they should deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither sons <S%H1121><s%> nor daughters <S%H1323><s%>, but they only should be delivered themselves <S%H5337><s%>.

Or if I send <S%H7971><s%> a pestilence <S%H1698><s%> into that land <S%H776><s%>, and pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon it in blood <S%H1818><s%>, to cut off <S%H3772><s%> from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>;

though Noah <S%H5146><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, and Job <S%H347><s%>, were in it <S%H8432><s%>, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, they should deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H518><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>; they should but deliver <S%H5337><s%> their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: How much more when I send <S%H7971><s%> my four <S%H702><s%> sore <S%H7451><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and the evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%>, and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, to cut off <S%H3772><s%> from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>!

Yet <S%H3498><s%>, behold, therein shall be left a remnant <S%H6413><s%> that shall be carried forth <S%H3318><s%>, both sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>: behold <S%H3318><s%>, they shall come forth unto you <S%H7200><s%>, and ye shall see their way <S%H1870><s%> and their doings <S%H5949><s%>; and ye shall be comforted <S%H5162><s%> concerning the evil <S%H7451><s%> that I have brought <S%H935><s%> upon Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, even concerning all that I have brought upon it <S%H935><s%>.

And they shall comfort <S%H5162><s%> you <S%H7200><s%>, when ye see their way <S%H1870><s%> and their doings <S%H5949><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I have not done <S%H6213><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%> all that I have done <S%H6213><s%> in it <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
